snippet: Benjamin Bagby and his early-music players, Sequentia, brought together medieval visions of the apocalypse at the Morgan Library.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews performance by medieval music ensemble Sequentia at the Morgan Library & Museum as part of the Boston Early Music Festival’s New York series.
lead_paragraph: Benjamin Bagby and his early-music players, Sequentia, brought together medieval visions of the apocalypse at the Morgan Library.

headline.seo: Benjamin Bagby and Sequentia at the Morgan Library
headline.main: The Fearsome Future Through Medieval Eyes
headline.print_headline: The Fearsome Future Through Medieval Eyes
